content: learn how to make a tunisian crochet kitchen towel for your home with this free crochet pattern this dish towel is made using the honeycomb stitch and the tunisian simple stitch you will first work the tunisian honeycomb stitch and then you will work the tunisian simple stitch after you ve made the simple stitch then you will work the honeycomb stitch pattern again once you ve completed all row you will slipstitch to bind off for the last row and then crochet a loop you will need - 1 skein of hobby lobby yarn bee cotton et lin - 6 5 mm tunisian crochet hook - darning needle - scissors
